item.description:
On Thursday, April 16th, join us for cocktails and cupcakes at Sweet, Worcester's hottest new dessert bar and lounge for free sweets, sex trivia with prizes, giveaways and a cash bar.

Come network with Worcester area supporters and test your sexual health knowledge! Suggested donation: $5.

Planned Parenthood League of Massachusetts (PPLM) is hosting this event to kick off our "Get Yourself Tested '09 Campaign" in April. Did you know that 1 of 2 people in the US contract a STD before age 25? Planned Parenthoods nationally have partnered with MTV, Seventeen Magazine and other health organizations to raise awareness about getting tested. Throughout the month of April PPLM is offering discounted, walk-in STD testing at all health center locations.
item.name: Cocktails and Cupcakes in Worcester
